description: Links between resources, e.g. data source and databank
If other linked resource, enter the name of the data source (default = not applicable)
The linkage method that was used to link resources
If a single variable (or linkage key) is used to link resources, provide a name and description of the variable
If a single variable is used to link resources, is the variable a unique identifier?
Provide a high-level description of the completeness of linkages that are currently available between resources (max 100 words)
Does the data source constitute of linked data sources?
